EmailTemplate.name: FLL Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Merchandising and Digital Marketing Workshop - Fort Lauderdale, FL - April 15
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Merchandising and Digital Marketing Workshop Fort Lauderdale, FL Wednesday, April 15, 2015
Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you Wednesday, April 15, 2015 at:
Location: Courtyard Fort Lauderdale North/Cypress Creek 2440 W. Cypress Creek Road Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309 (954) 772-7770
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale North/Cypress Creek, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/fllcp-courtyard-fort-lauderdale-north-cypress-creek/> or call the hotel directly at (954) 772-7770. We look forward to seeing you there!
